website_summaries.verdict: Comprehensive, attractive, well-written, and easy to understand.
pros: Written by a cardiologist, this is a great overall tome for those wanting to understand and explore the Mediterranean diet and its health benefits, along with 500 recipes to make it happen
cons: Some consumers feel the recipes are too complex or require too many ingredients
Some “fake” or processed foods are included like egg substitute and soybean oil

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Ozner's The Complete Mediterranean Diet is great!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a nurse and because of that she is always taking CEU courses. Several of her recent ones extolled the benefits of the Mediterranean cooking & eating plan. I bought 3 plan books but this one had the best two week menu plan that made it easy to try a whole new way of eating. We have tried probably 20 new menu items and for a person that is steeped in comfort foods I must say I am impressed with the taste , texture and the preparation guides of this book. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Kolber

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive
customer_reviews.text: A great amount of information clearly presented. A large number of recipes you can actually use.The recipes in many respects are similar to what is presented in the South Beach Diet. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes and easy to follow eating plan
customer_reviews.text: The recipes in this book are some of the best I have found in a "diet" book. Most of the recipes call for staples in the average kitchen (if you already eat lots of fresh vegetables and lean meats.) or are easily found in the grocery store (no hunting for hard to find ingredients). I especially liked the pasta e fagioli and lentil soup recipes. The diet itself is easy to follow and is actually realistic, but you do have to be willing to prep and cook versus relying on processed foods.
customer_reviews.author: MarLu

customer_reviews.title: Just What the Title Promises
customer_reviews.text: A good guide to adopting the Mediterranean style diet recommended by my cardiologist. I lost over 30 lbs in the first three months of following this guide.
customer_reviews.author: BIF

customer_reviews.title: Mediterranean Diet:  Everything
customer_reviews.text: This book does have everything you need to follow an eating extravaganza of the delicious and healthy foods shared by the people of Greece, Italy and Spain. It focuses on the approach of their dietary habits that afford them long, healthy lives. While there are no photos of prepared meals, it is written for the imagination to picture recipes from appetizers to desserts that are practical in ingredients, easy to read , affordable and very tasty. Each recipe has nutritional information making it easier if you're counting calories, carbs, fat grams or whatever. The book has earned a favorite spot in my everyday kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tula Andonaras

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous book!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I originally got this book from our local library to see what they had to say about the mediterranean diet and to get recipes. Once we opened the book we realized we needed to buy the book. The information and recipes in this are both outstanding. I'd recommend this book to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Very informative and full of great information.  So worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge book. It has about everything you could possibly want to know about the Mediterranean Diet. Loads and loads of recipes. I have been on this diet for about two months and I have lost 16 pounds - mostly because I no longer eat ice cream. Now the idea of sweets is just not appealing and my eating choices are far more healthy. This is a very informative book. I don't think you will be disappointed if you purchase this book. You certainly get your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Mumsy

customer_reviews.title: Not useful
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating and not useful for me. Recipes all too elaborate, time consuming and use too many ingredients I can't keep on hand. All the recipes are inappropriate for a small family and would be Very hard to cut down for 1or2 people even if you coul freeze leftovers. I bought it to have some usable recipes for my daily life. This book was a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great, comprehensive book
customer_reviews.text: Great, comprehensive book! I purchased it for my Mother after Mitral Valve Replacement Surgery. She was advised to make major changes to her lifestyle and a healthy mediterranean diet was in order. The introduction to the diet was perfect! My Step Father is also on the diet and they both commented on the great introduction. They are able to cook at home and they have discovered Middle Eastern restaurants in their town and love them! I would recommend this book to anyone who needs a through, comprehensive introduction, and recipes and lifestyle tips!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying this cookbook. When I received it, I went through every page! I sat with mini post-it notes and tabbed pages with recipes to try. I'm not sticking strictly to the diet (yet) but have a lot of yummy, healthy recipes in rotation. I'm not as critical as some who have commented that this is not the "true" Mediterranean Diet from abroad; I'm not looking for that in this cookbook. It is a really good cookbook for my tastes and I have found the recipes pretty easy to prepare and very easy to enjoy eating!! Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shan M.

customer_reviews.title: The Basic Cookbook I was Looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a basic Mediterranean cookbook that gave me a lot of good options to choose between, and this does an excellent job of that. My wife and I are new to this style of cooking, and this cookbook has given us a good overview of our options. We have tried about 40 of the recipes, all have been good and the prep time estimates have been reasonably accurate. Most recipes are for 4-8 servings, so we have enjoyed a lot of leftovers. We have had to buy some new spices, but we are using them on a regular basis now and I buy them in bulk through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Good Practical Eating Plan
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to know just what the Mediterranean diet consists of and this book really delves into the eating plan giving a great explanation of what it is and why it is good for you. Out of all the diet books I have read and I have read plenty, this one seems more of a no nonsense healthy way of eating rather than a strict diet plan. I really like it. It's practical and you can eat everyday foods working them into your diet without having to spend money on expensive and weird products that you won't stick to anyway. Good information.
customer_reviews.author: Rose06

customer_reviews.title: If you stick to the diet, it works fast
customer_reviews.text: If you follow this diet, which allows for a hefty amount of fresh vegetables, chicken, limited amount of red meat, etc. I know someone who has a lot of medical conditions and within three weeks the lab reports came back improved. This is what inspired me to buy this book.
customer_reviews.author: snowflake

customer_reviews.title: Great book with terrific recipes
customer_reviews.text: I just had a cardiac event and my doctor told me to go on the Mediterranean diet. I bought a couple of other books but couldn't use them because the sodium content in a lot of the recipes wound up being 2/3 my daily allotted intake. I decided to try this book. I've made a few recipes and they are great tasting. Yes, a few recipes have high sodium but most don't. And it has the nutritional values listed which some books don't have. It's definitely a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Allene

customer_reviews.title: Get a good Greek, Italian or Middle Eastern cookbook for recipes
customer_reviews.text: Get a good Greek, Italian or Middle Eastern cookbook for recipes. The rest of the info is on the internet for free.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this "diet" book because my husband has heart disease at a young age. It really isn't a diet but a lifestyle of healthy eating. We did a lot of this already but I really love this book and it explains this type of eating perfectly. I was happily surprised at how many recipes there are. So far I made two dishes and they were delicious, easy to make and quick. Even my kids liked them. I'm so happy I found this book. It had really inspired us to eat better and enjoy food and life. I can't wait to try more recipes!! Again there are tons of them using easy to find ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Calorie estimations are way off
customer_reviews.text: I love the recipes and I use the book most every day. The only complaint is the estimated calories/serving which are way off For example page 260 Pasta fresca with fresh crab and lemon 300cal/serving Serves 2. If you add up the ingredients it comes to 1350 calories or 675/serving Quite a difference. And I checked several others with similar results. So if you are counting calories do not rely on their estimation. But the food is great and easy to make
customer_reviews.author: Peter Dan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and easy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this recipe book for almost a year and everything I’ve made from it has turned it to be both beautiful and delicious. Bonus is that the recipes call for simple easy-to-find ingredients and they come together quickly. We continue to revisit favorites and enjoy new ones
customer_reviews.author: EAP

customer_reviews.title: Recipes too complicated and time consuming
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a book with recipes that are realistic to prepare for someone with a full time job. This book is not it. I don't have two hours to make lunch, breakfast or dinner every day, or time for daily grocery store trips for ingredients. I liked this introduction chapters about the diet itself. I wish I had read more of the reviews before purchasing. My Doctor recommended the Mediterranean Diet to lower cholesterol. I will keep searching for a more realistic way to incorporate this type of diet into a busy lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.L.

customer_reviews.title: Hypes soy as a diet protein.
customer_reviews.text: For a Mediterranean diet, I didn't expect to see soy touted. Fresh fish, legumes, chicken, milk proteins, nuts, etc. are traditional, but not soy - which can be toxic. Some recipes look like they will be effective, but that really turned me off trusting this eating plan.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good book, good recipes
customer_reviews.text: This book of Mediterranean diet recipes came with a surprise - the front section is all about heart disease in its various forms and how the Mediterranean diet helps people with heart disease. That's not why I am following this eating plan, but it was still good information. The recipes look yummy, and we've already tried a few. Opa!
customer_reviews.author: JylM

customer_reviews.title: Mediterranean cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Very large book. I'm in the middle on this one. The recipes are easy to follow. But I haven't fixed anything from this book that I would eat again. Maybe it's me and my family but so far we haven't enjoyed any of the meals. Theres no pictures except the front cover. That's the biggest downfall for me on any cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Dane Witch

customer_reviews.title: Good content.
customer_reviews.text: Content is good and informative. Not one picture in this entire book accept the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Extraordinary Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The Complete Mediterranean Diet
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent cookbook. Most of the recipes are easy to prepare and very tasty. I especially liked the fish and seafood recipes. There are a lot of pasta dishes which if, for people like me, you cannot eat freely, you can still enjoy all these dishes by using alternative noodles. I especially liked the first chapter which spells out how to put the meals together.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: One of the best books I have bought!!
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted with the Mediterranean diet book because the book wasn't half full of written scientific diet information like most of all the other books I have. I am thrilled to have 500 delicious recipes to try! As a pasta lover I can't believe I can still eat pasta and Lose weight. Very well written and informative! Kudos to Dr. Ozner for such good and thorough information. Ciao.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: To Your Health
customer_reviews.text: This is an unbelievable book!!! Knowing that you can prevent heart disease at best and how to "fix" it at worse is a game changer. This puts the person in the drivers seat and NOT the disease! The number of delicious recipes gives one a number of choices to proceed with a heart healthy diet. If avoiding heart attacks, stokes and living longer is your goal, then this is the book to get! However, purchasing the book is not the only thing to do. TAKE ACTION and implement the dietary changes FOR LIFE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great Recipes!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of great recipes, fresh foods. I made so many bookmarks, I shouldn't have bothered. Whole book is great. Husband didn't even realize it was a diet. You have to like to cook and make sure you have the pantry necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mia's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Must have book
customer_reviews.text: This book is definitely the Complete cookbook. There are over 500 recipes and great information about the Mediterranean way of eating. The recipes are very tasty and easy to make- plus they give you nutritional caloric information with each recipe. I have lost 65 pounds eating the Mediterranean way and my health is better than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Chari Jones

customer_reviews.title: a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Great cookbook, easy recipes, ingredients available anywhere. Highly recommend for someone who wants to eat healthy, likes to cook simply, and as a bonus to lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: francine

customer_reviews.title: TONS of great recipes
customer_reviews.text: Great cookbook with tons of recipes. I am vegetarian, and this book has a lot of great vegetarian recipes. There are also a lot of seafood recipes and some meat ones too. The book is light weight, and the recipes are easy and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: heatherlily17

customer_reviews.title: This cookbook is filled with TONS of amazing recipes. The Mediterranean diet isn't necessarily for losing ...
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook is filled with TONS of amazing recipes. The Mediterranean diet isn't necessarily for losing weight drastically, but it's essential for heart health and an overall healthy lifestyle. If you love recipes filled with lots of yummy garlic, veggies, and pasta, this is a good source! Only down side is that there are zero pictures. Otherwise, it's a great cookbook!
customer_reviews.author: swalke90

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I like this book! Any book with diet in it dredges up food denial, I was surprised at all the recipes that made my mouth water. I recommend this book to all, it belongs to everyone's cookbook library.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Ficek

customer_reviews.title: It is just what I had in mind and I know I will like cooking with it
customer_reviews.text: I'm still picking this book up and reading through it. It is just what I had in mind and I know I will like cooking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Huegel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not mentioned- most of the desserts have artificial sweetener. That is not my idea of eating healthier. Ros
customer_reviews.author: rosalyn s bishop

customer_reviews.title: Best diet book I've seen!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of recipes. Stick with it and you'll be healthier and lose weight. I lost 20 pounds and wife lost 10 pounds in 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Dan the man

customer_reviews.title: While the book is very well written, it would ...
customer_reviews.text: While the book is very well written, it would be helpful if a day of the diet were dishes that were faster to prepare. Think Rachael Ray's 30 minute meals.
customer_reviews.author: Ginmint

customer_reviews.title: All in one book, good deal
customer_reviews.text: As it says, complete. Nice book for the money. With health issues, wanted an all in one book
customer_reviews.author: fran in pa

customer_reviews.title: a lifesaver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Soooooooooo helpful. I'm diabetic, and at first I was scared of how to live. This book has given me so much confidence. I feel like I know enough to live not fearing I'm doing "healthy" all wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Heyitsme

customer_reviews.title: Best one
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Med diet. Real most of them. Very useful info about food and nutrients. Five stars. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very small intro about the diet, a lot of recipes, but no explanation on how to follow the concepts
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Cataldo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have not read it in its intirerty, but I'm liking what I have read so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Great book with lots of information! I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Cieara

customer_reviews.title: Lots of recipes but no pictures😞
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of recipes but no pictures. It would be better to have less recipes and add pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte A. Gough

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: There are so many better books for the Mediterranean Diet. Also no pictures of the recipes and they are pretty boring.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this book! So many great recipes, perfect guideline to the mediterranean diet. Well worth the money. Great information as well. My first recipe was delicious! This is just what I was looking for.I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great medical info and easy recipes but...no pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Very comprehensive book that includes the medical benefits of the Mediterranean Diet plus hundreds of recipes. The recipes are not difficult and most have 10 or less ingredients. The only thing I miss are pictures. Not a single pix in the book. I like to see what new recipes are going to look like.
customer_reviews.author: D. Clark

customer_reviews.title: I am slim but have stomach problems and love this diet and am maintaining my weight
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the recipes and my spouse who has a weight problem and heart valve has lost 16 pounds in a little over a week. I am slim but have stomach problems and love this diet and am maintaining my weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Weeks

customer_reviews.title: She also appreciates all of the great recipes.
customer_reviews.text: Very full description of the Mediterranean Diet eating plan. My wife loves the details and facts behind the style. She also appreciates all of the great recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Meliso

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT cookbook
customer_reviews.text: This is what you've been looking for if Mediterranean cooking is your interest. LOTS OF RECIPES. Easy to read and I don't mind the absence of photos.
customer_reviews.author: George Velez

customer_reviews.title: Good reading and recipies!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Thanks for a fast and smooth transaction. Highly recommend! A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Chastant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new cook book and diet already lost a couple of pounds!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: I have tried several and am very pleased with the outcome
customer_reviews.text: The recipes in this book are extensive and delicious. I have tried several and am very pleased with the outcome. I look forward to using this book as my weekly reference for new and exciting dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lewis

customer_reviews.title: A good cookbook, but not what I thought it would ...
customer_reviews.text: A good cookbook, but not what I thought it would be. I was looking for more instruction on the diet itself.
customer_reviews.author: J. Green

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook.
customer_reviews.text: Great recipe book. Lots of recipes, great selection, all have easy to source ingredients and the directions are clear and comprehensive.
customer_reviews.author: John StrobelMark Mullis

customer_reviews.title: OK, mostly recipes.
customer_reviews.text: Book is OK. Does have good information about the Mediterranean Diet. I would have liked more info on it. The majority of this book is recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B. Omeara

customer_reviews.title: We loved Salmon with Wilted Spinach
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying this cookbook very much. Recipes I have prepared have a very fresh tAste. We loved Salmon with Wilted Spinach. We also enjoyed Chicken salad that had apples and oranges, very refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Lachance5 stars and will eant to read yhe rrst.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great book however some of the proteins listed are difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book however some of the proteins listed are difficult to find if you don't live in a big city.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: No per person serving size
customer_reviews.text: I just got this cookbook today. I've enjoyed reading the recipes, they seem easy to make and require no special products. BUT, they do not give a serving size.....they just say however many people it serves, and what it breaks down by carbs, protein etc. If you're looking to use this as a true diet, and be accountable for servings, this is not the book for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Spinney

customer_reviews.title: Great book to learn how to eat properly
customer_reviews.text: Great book to learn how to eat properly. I think we all recognize these concepts....just nice to see it in an easy to read and use book. Too bad there are no pictures though.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anne Schram

customer_reviews.title: Kind of boring cookbook, There are plenty of recipes though
customer_reviews.text: Kind of boring cookbook, There are plenty of recipes though. Just no illustrations
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes!
customer_reviews.text: If you like Italian and Greek food, you'll love this cookbook.....even if you're NOT on a diet!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it said - hopefully I can follow it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it advertizes
customer_reviews.text: I guess this will give you everything you need to know if you want to go on this diet. There were lots of recipes. However I found it wasn't right for me
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Only good thing about the book was that dropped in price ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on recommendation of my doctor. Really wish I'd picked up a copy from the library first. Far too many dessert recipes and the liberal use of no-calorie sweetners doesn't seem very Mediterranean to me. Only good thing about the book was that dropped in price from the time I put it in the cart to the time I actually purchased it. Mediterranean Harvest is much better. Doubt I will be using this book much, if at all. I did purchase it for recipes, not for the brief description of what a Mediterranean diet consists of.
customer_reviews.author: Dianka

customer_reviews.title: Lots of recipe variety!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of good recipes that will keep my dinners interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed it very much
customer_reviews.text: It was everything that I had hoped for. I enjoyed it very much.
customer_reviews.author: ROGER HAGAN

customer_reviews.title: Take your health and Life back eat, cook live healthy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good book and with my health issues, the book was what I needed came highly recommended by my family doctor, the cardiologist. And a Nutrionist.
customer_reviews.author: Christine (FairyTail Acres the Rescue)

customer_reviews.title: Lots of recipes, no pics
customer_reviews.text: Quite a few recipes but no pictures. I like to know what my food is supposed to look like, so took a star off for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well written reference book for this way of eating. Wish it had photos.

customer_reviews.title: it has good information about the Mediterranean diet
customer_reviews.text: It's was as expected ,it has good information about the Mediterranean diet.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cookbook. The recipes are easy to follow and the ingredients are ingredients that we use in every day cooking. The recipes are good and very rarely do I find myself changing them.
customer_reviews.author: Trade Wind Products

customer_reviews.title: So many choice!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choices & flavors to help keep you on your path to good health. Recipes are easy to recreate.

customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return the item . Recipes are VERY bland. Very disappointing.

customer_reviews.text: I like the variety of recipes. I won't lose interest while I eat healthy.

customer_reviews.text: I got this book for my mother for Christmas and she is thrilled with it! It is huge and has SO much useful information and recipes.

customer_reviews.text: very fast shipping. I am very pleased with the book I ordered.
